title: Saudi Business Launchpad marketing website + lead capture (frontend)

requirements.summary: Create responsive marketing site with top-level navigation and routes for 8 pages (English-only).
acceptanceCriteria: A persistent header navigation links to all 8 pages and works on mobile (hamburger menu) and desktop.
Each page renders distinct content sections aligned to the requested structure.
The site is mobile-first and responsive across common breakpoints.

file_operations.description: Create the root app router and layout wiring for the 8 required routes/pages (Home, Services, How It Works, Pricing, Resources, Mentorship & Networking, About Us, Contact/Get Started), ensuring all user-facing text is English.

Create a persistent responsive header with desktop nav + mobile hamburger menu. Use shadcn-ui primitives (e.g., Button, Sheet/Drawer, Navigation/Popover as available) to implement the menu; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a persistent footer region with consistent branding and quick links to all top-level pages.
Create a shared layout wrapper composing SiteHeader + main content container + SiteFooter for consistent spacing and responsive behavior.
Create the Home page view scaffold and section layout (hero, trust indicators, highlights) wired into the router.
Create the Services page view scaffold and section layout wired into the router.
Create the How It Works page view scaffold and section layout wired into the router.
Create the Pricing page view scaffold and section layout wired into the router.
Create the Resources page view scaffold and section layout wired into the router.
Create the Mentorship & Networking page view scaffold and section layout wired into the router.
Create the About Us page view scaffold and section layout wired into the router.
Create the Contact / Get Started page view scaffold and wire it into the router (form implementation handled under REQ-9).

requirements.summary: Implement Home page hero, CTAs, and trust indicators with exact required text.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page shows the exact requested headline text.
Home hero includes the exact durable hero sentence: “All-in-one platform for starting and managing businesses in Saudi Arabia — legally, confidently, and faster.”
Both CTAs are visible above the fold on mobile and desktop and navigate to appropriate pages/sections (e.g., Contact/Get Started and Services or a registration flow teaser).
Trust indicators are displayed in a dedicated section (e.g., icon list or badges) and clearly communicate Saudi-focused, compliant, and expert-backed.

file_operations.description: Implement the Home hero section with the exact headline and durable hero sentence, add two above-the-fold CTAs (“Get Started”, “Register Your Business”) linking to Contact/Get Started and a relevant page/section (e.g., Services), and add a dedicated trust indicators section (Saudi-focused, compliant, expert-backed). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button, Card, Badge) for CTA and trust UI; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Centralize route paths/labels for header navigation and CTA linking (e.g., CONTACT and SERVICES) to ensure CTAs navigate consistently across pages.

requirements.summary: Build Services page with five scannable service categories and CTAs to Contact/Get Started.
acceptanceCriteria: Services page displays exactly the five requested service categories with concise descriptions.
Each service is visually scannable (card/grid or section layout) and responsive.
Each service includes a “Get Started”/“Talk to an Expert” style link that routes to Contact/Get Started.

file_operations.description: Implement five responsive service cards/sections for: Business Registration Guidance, Regulatory Compliance Support, Operational Setup Assistance, VAT & ZATCA Compliance, Licensing & Documentation Support; each includes a CTA linking to Contact/Get Started. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button components for a consistent scannable layout; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a reusable ServiceCard component (title, description, icon, CTA) to keep Services and related trust/service highlights consistent. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Build How It Works page with a 3-step flow in a mobile-readable timeline/numbered layout.
acceptanceCriteria: How It Works page displays the three steps in order with clear headings matching the requested text.
The steps are presented as a timeline/numbered steps layout that remains readable on mobile.

file_operations.description: Implement the three steps in order with headings exactly: Step 1 “Choose Business Type”, Step 2 “Get Guided Registration”, Step 3 “Stay Compliant & Scale”, using a responsive numbered/timeline layout.

Create a reusable StepsTimeline component to render numbered steps responsively (stacked on mobile, horizontal/connected on larger screens). Use shadcn-ui Card/Separator as appropriate; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Build Pricing page with Free/Pro/Enterprise plans, Pro monthly vs yearly, and pay-per-service section with CTAs.
acceptanceCriteria: Pricing page shows three primary plan cards (Free, Pro, Enterprise) and a separate pay-per-service section.
Pro plan clearly presents both monthly and yearly options (toggle or side-by-side).
Each plan has a CTA leading to Contact/Get Started.

file_operations.description: Implement pricing UI with three plan cards (Free, Pro with monthly+yearly, Enterprise) and a separate pay-per-service section. Include CTAs on each plan to Contact/Get Started. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button and Tabs/ToggleGroup (or a simple segmented control) to present Pro monthly vs yearly; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a reusable plan card component for consistent plan presentation (title, price, features, CTA). Use shadcn-ui Card/Button; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Build Resources page with four categories and multiple static downloadable-looking items per category.
acceptanceCriteria: Resources page contains the four requested categories with multiple example items per category (static placeholders are acceptable).
Resource items are displayed in a consistent card/list UI and are responsive.

file_operations.description: Implement Resources sections for Business templates, Compliance checklists, Startup guides, Knowledge base, each with multiple static placeholder items displayed as consistent responsive cards/links (downloadable-looking). Use shadcn-ui Card/Button/Link styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a reusable ResourceList component for consistent rendering of resource items within each category. Use shadcn-ui Card and optional icons; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Build Mentorship & Networking page with three sections and CTAs to Contact/Get Started.
acceptanceCriteria: Mentorship & Networking page includes the three requested sections with clear headings and concise copy.
Each section includes a CTA leading to Contact/Get Started.

file_operations.description: Implement three sections: access to Saudi business mentors, a startup community, and a partner ecosystem; each section includes a CTA linking to Contact/Get Started. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button for scannable sections; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Build About Us page including mission text, Vision 2030 alignment, and local expertise/partnership emphasis.
acceptanceCriteria: About page includes the mission statement text “Empower Saudi entrepreneurs”.
About page mentions alignment with Saudi Vision 2030.
About page includes content about local expertise and partnerships.

file_operations.description: Implement About Us page content including the exact mission statement “Empower Saudi entrepreneurs”, mention Saudi Vision 2030 alignment, and highlight local expertise & partnerships.

requirements.summary: Build Contact / Get Started form with client-side validation, success/error states, and configurable WhatsApp/Email links; submit lead to backend.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact page renders a form with required full name + email fields and optional fields as specified.
Form validates required fields client-side and shows success/error states.
WhatsApp and Email contact methods are shown as clickable links (WhatsApp link should be configurable; do not hardcode a real number unless provided).

file_operations.description: Implement the Contact / Get Started form fields (required: full name, email; optional: phone, business stage/type, message), client-side validation, and success/error UI states. Wire form submit to call the backend capability submitLead via the existing actor hook. Use shadcn-ui Form-related primitives (Input, Textarea, Button, Alert) as available; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a React hook (React Query mutation) that calls the backend capability submitLead and exposes loading/success/error state for the Contact page.
Add configurable marketing contact settings (e.g., WhatsApp URL and contact email) sourced from environment variables, and provide safe fallbacks that do not hardcode a real WhatsApp number.

requirements.summary: Add per-page SEO titles/meta descriptions and a footer with branding, quick links, and legal-disclaimer trust signal.
acceptanceCriteria: Each page sets an appropriate title and meta description including relevant keywords where natural.
Site includes a footer with company name and quick links.
A disclaimer is visible in footer or relevant pages stating the platform provides guidance and is not a substitute for professional legal advice.

file_operations.description: Create a lightweight Seo component that sets document title and meta description on render/navigation, allowing each page to supply keywords naturally (e.g., Saudi business registration, start a business in Saudi Arabia, Saudi compliance platform, business setup KSA, Saudi startup support).
Wire Seo component with Home-specific title/meta description containing relevant keywords naturally.
Wire Seo component with Services-specific title/meta description containing relevant keywords naturally.
Wire Seo component with How It Works-specific title/meta description containing relevant keywords naturally.
Wire Seo component with Pricing-specific title/meta description containing relevant keywords naturally.
Wire Seo component with Resources-specific title/meta description containing relevant keywords naturally.
Wire Seo component with Mentorship & Networking-specific title/meta description containing relevant keywords naturally.
Wire Seo component with About-specific title/meta description containing relevant keywords naturally.
Wire Seo component with Contact/Get Started-specific title/meta description containing relevant keywords naturally.
Add consistent footer branding (Saudi Business Launchpad), quick links to all pages, and a visible disclaimer stating content provides guidance and is not a substitute for professional legal advice.
Ensure base HTML contains language and baseline meta tags appropriate for SEO; keep per-page title/meta handled by the Seo component.

requirements.summary: Apply consistent modern Saudi-friendly design system (green/white + subtle gold accents), typography, spacing, and trust-focused visuals.
acceptanceCriteria: Primary UI uses a green/white palette with restrained gold accents and high contrast for accessibility.
Typography and spacing are consistent across all pages.
Key sections use trust-focused visual motifs (icons/illustrations) without cluttering the layout.

file_operations.description: Create/define global Tailwind base styles and CSS variables to express the Saudi-friendly palette (green/white with subtle gold accents), typography, and consistent spacing defaults.

Adjust Tailwind theme tokens (via existing CSS variable-driven color system) to align primary/accent usage with the requested green/white and subtle gold accents while preserving accessibility contrast.
Apply consistent layout container widths, section spacing, and typographic hierarchy across pages for a professional/modern look.

requirements.summary: Integrate required generated static hero illustration and icon set as public assets and use them in Home hero and trust/service UI.
acceptanceCriteria: All generated images are stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend (not via backend).
Home page hero uses the generated hero visual.
Service/trust sections use the generated icons consistently.

file_operations.description: Add the generated hero illustration asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/sbl-hero.dim_1600x900.png.
Add the generated icon asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/sbl-icon-registration.dim_128x128.png.
Add the generated icon asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/sbl-icon-compliance.dim_128x128.png.
Add the generated icon asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/sbl-icon-growth.dim_128x128.png.
Add the generated icon asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/sbl-icon-mentorship.dim_128x128.png.
Add the generated icon asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/sbl-icon-network.dim_128x128.png.
Reference and render the generated hero image from frontend/public/assets/generated/sbl-hero.dim_1600x900.png within the Home hero section.

Use generated icons (e.g., frontend/public/assets/generated/sbl-icon-registration.dim_128x128.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/sbl-icon-compliance.dim_128x128.png) within service cards for trust-focused visuals.

Use generated icons (e.g., frontend/public/assets/generated/sbl-icon-mentorship.dim_128x128.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/sbl-icon-network.dim_128x128.png) consistently within mentorship/networking sections.
Support optional icon rendering in ServiceCard so generated icons can be applied consistently across services/trust sections.
